articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: HCL Tech up 4%, extend gains as brokerages raise EPS estimates on Q3 beat - Moneycontrol
articles.description: HCL Technologies has slightly reduced its revenue growth guidance for FY24 from 5-6 percent YoY in constant currency terms to now 5-5.5 percent, though it has maintained its margin guidance of 18-19 percent.
articles.content: Shares of HCL Technologies opened 4 percent higher on January 15, extending gains for a second day in a row, with brokerages raising FY24, FY25 and FY26 earnings estimates for the company following a… [+3611 chars]
